title: paalayamaam sree
sahitya:
pAlayamAm shrI rukmiNI nAyaka bhaktAmita dAyaka



anupallavi



 nIla varNa tulasI vanamAla nirupama shIla brndAvana lOla



caraNam 1



 kanakAmbaradhara kamanIya vigraha kALiya mada nigraha  

sanakAdi vandita caraNAravinda saccidAnanda gOvinda mukunda



caraNam 2



 gOpa vESadhara gOvardhanOddhAra gOkula kalahamsa 

pApAndhakAra divAkara shrIkara tApasa mAnasa sArasa hamsa



caraNam 3



 nIlAmbarAnuja nitya nirvikAra nigamAnta sancAra 

bAlArkka kOTi prakAsha vilAsa rAmadAsa nija hrdaya nivAsa
